product.title: Hub Cap - w/ Hole OEM - FJ40, FJ45, FJ55, FJ60, FJ62, BJ 1958-1990
product.body_html: OEM Toyota - Fits OEM steel wheels. 1958 - 1990 - Buy the set and SAVE $$$$!! Spruce up your FJ40, or go for the vintage look on your 60 series. These hubcaps, in combination with the OEM steel wheels, look great on any Land Cruiser! Note: For FJ60/62 fitment, you will need to purchase a set of OEM FJ40 steel wheels, which have spring tabs for mounting these hub caps. The 40 series wheels have the same bolt pattern, size, and backspacig as 60 series. *Tech Tip: Some Land Cruisers made it out of the showroom without ever being fitted with manual locking hubs, and instead, still have the factory-installed drive plates on the front axle. If you have manual locking hubs, (most do) you will need 2 of these for the front wheels, and 2 of the closed versions for the rear wheels.
